title: Opening Reactions: Nets & Lakers Struggle, Strength In The East
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN's Tim MacMahon and Tim Bontemps to talk the start of the NBA season including an potential tone setting comeback for the Suns, the strength of the Eastern Conference, if the Knicks could finish higher than the Nets and assess LeBron’s thoughts on the state of the Lakers. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, NBA, Brian Windhorst
itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: What Can The Lakers Do To Improve? How Concerned Should The Nets Be?
